title: Hagal-Marth
body:
History

Origin - The Age of Creation

Urunine makes Hagal-Marth and the other Hagalisk.

The Age of Races & The War of the Beasts

Hagal-Marth and the other Hagalisk are called upon by Urunine to fight in The War of the Beasts.

Appearance

Hagal-Marth shares a similar appearance to the rest of the Hagalisk. However, he is more intelligent than his counterparts, but not as strong as Hagann-Tante, nor as swift as Haguth-Khol. He is the only one of the Hagalisk to wear armour. His thick horns are made from multiple horned plates, that can either protrude downwards like the horns of a ram, or upwards like a bull.
preface: Hagal-Marth is one of the three Hagalisk.
